column4: this may be off topic, but if anybody knows a good shop that sells computers with ubuntu pre-installed id appreciate it. dell seems ovepriced for my needs
why don't you ask them not to install windows and install ubuntu your self?
because i want them to run a burn in test on the hardware before shipping it my way
ive had a couple pieces of hardware that dont play well with ubuntu. rare, but i wont to make sure before i take possession
